kombuchas.Description: Clarke loves Health-Ade kombucha, which comes in sixteen different organic flavors. The Ginger-Lemon flavor, which is made with a mix of black and green teas, plus fresh ginger and lemon juice, is a particularly popular pick.
kombuchas.Name: Health-Ade Organic Kombucha
kombuchas.Structure: Per 8-ounce serving: 35 calories, 0 g fat, 10 mg sodium, 7 g carbs, 5 g sugar, 0 g protein

kombuchas.Name: Brew Dr. Organic Kombucha
kombuchas.Description: Brew Dr. is another of Clarke’s favorite kombucha brands. Try the Uplift Caffeinated flavor, which is made with a blend of yerba mate, green tea, and guayusa. With 130 milligrams of caffeine per bottle, it makes for the perfect a.m. pick-me-up.
kombuchas.Structure: Per 7-ounce serving: 35 calories, 0 g fat, 0 mg sodium, 9 g carbs, 8 g sugars, 0 g protein
